server.model.translator

Class ModelTRConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.translator.ModelTRConverter

  • public class ModelTRConverter
extends Object
    This class is a static library for converting our model objects into Transfer objects compatible with Gson. It relies heavily on method overloading. There is only one method for this class called toTRObject().
    Author:
    Craig Call
